Title: 🎬 Russian soldiers ride into a storm on the frontlines in Ukrain...
Description: Russian soldiers ride into a storm on the frontlines in Ukraine, seemingly in a buggy, driving by fortifications, debris, and weaving through burnt out vehicle carcasses. The passenger riding shotgun holds a shotgun to fend off drones. @ourwarstoday Video is too big

Title: ↩️🖼 🇷🇺 🌋 The Shiveluch #volcano in #Russia has erupted, sendi...
Description: Our Wars, Today: A volcano has erupted in Russia 🇷🇺 🌋 The Shiveluch #volcano in #Russia has erupted, sending ash 8 kilometers into the sky and lava rolling down its side after a 7.0 magnitude #earthquake the Kamchatkatka region on Russia's east coast struck earlier. The volcano sits around 450 kilometers from the city of Petropavlovsk-Kamchatsky, minor damage to buildings closer to the volcano is reported. @ourwarstoday No casualties according to TASS, U.S. Geological Survey (USGS) said the earthquake's epicenter was 55 miles from Petropavlovsk-Kamchatsky, and the depth of it was around 30 miles. Although Russia did not issue a #tsunami warning, the U.S. has, along the epicenter.Volcanic ash and minor lava eruptions are common at various times throughout the year; it's name means -smoking mountain- as it and the volcano Karymsky, also on the Kamchatka Peninsula, are some of the most active and continuously erupting volcanoes on the planet.Photos: Astra

Title: 🎬 A Russian soldier with a proclivity for shooting down drones, ...
Description: A Russian soldier with a proclivity for shooting down drones, reportedly with the callsign -Half a Kilo-. The Russian soldier is said to from Yakutia, Republic of Sakha, and part of the 1461st Motorized Rifle -Sedoy- Regiment. Notably, this regiment seems to have put a specific focus on training its troops on anti-drone warfare, both with small arms and electronically. @ourwarstoday Source: t.me/voin_dv

Title: 🎬🖼 Chechen Assault Cybertruck: Leader of the #Russian-aligned #...
Description: Chechen Assault Cybertruck:Leader of the #Russian-aligned #Chechen Republic Ramzan #Kadyrov recently showed off his modified Cybertruck that has a mounted heavy machine gun, a Kord 12.7mm. He promises to bring this improvised fighting vehicle/NSTV/technical to the frontlines in #Ukraine where it will be -in demand- according to him. Posted today August 17th. @ourwarstodayKadyrov: -We received a Tesla cybertruck from the respected Elon Musk.I was happy to test the new equipment and personally saw that it is not by chance that it is called the -Cyberbeast-. A real invulnerable and fast animal. A maneuverable vehicle, it develops excellent speed and overcomes obstacles. A very comfortable car. Based on such excellent characteristics, the cybertruck will soon be sent to the SVO zone, where it will be in demand in appropriate conditions. I am sure that this -beast- will bring a lot of benefit to our soldiers.I express my sincere gratitude to Elon Musk! He is, of course, the strongest genius of our time and a specialist. A great man! Well, the cybertruck turned out to be a powerful project. Undoubtedly one of the best cars in the world! I literally fell in love with this car.Elon, thank you! Come to Grozny, I will receive you as the most dear guest! I do not think that our Russian MFA will be against such a trip. And, of course, we are waiting for your new developments that will contribute to the completion of the SVO.-Source: t.me/RKadyrov_95/4999 Video is too big
